title: Reconnect screen on my client after champ select
body: My problem here is most likely similar to the other recent errors lots of palyers are reporting. But instead of having this "reconnect error" after a game i have it when i leave champ select ..so loading screen wont start and it gives me the reconnect button, when im pressing it nothing happens

replies.body: If you're having that issue what *starting* a game, it's most likely going to be connection related. Your network is able to communicate with the client and get you placed in a lobby, but when it's trying to place you in the game it can't quite get a clean signal. Run through these [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) troubleshooting steps paying close attention to port forwarding and any firewalls you might have that are blocking your connection.
